radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the chest and abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: Small left pleural effusion and anasarca.
Enhancement and edema throughout the major muscle groups of the right thigh.
Air-space disease in the left lower lobe and a small, left-sided pleural effusion.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse thickening of the small-bowel wall, minimal ascites, and no mesenteric inflammation.
